classitems.description: Hide this plugin from selection widget
classitems.name: hideFromSelection

classitems.name: canHandleResults
classitems.default: If resultset contains boolean val, return true

classitems.description: If we need to dynamically check which plugin to use, we rank the possible plugins by priority, and select the highest one
classitems.name: getPriority

classitems.description: Hide this plugin from selection widget

classitems.name: canHandleResults

classitems.description: postprocess

Registered plugins. Add a plugin by adding it to this object. 
Each plugin -must- return an object from the constructor with the following keys: draw (function) and 
options (object with keys hideFromSelection, canHandlerResults, getPriority and name)
Want to add your own plugin? I'd advice you use the boolean plugin as a template
classitems.name: YASR.plugins

classitems.description:
The default options of YASR. Either change the default options by setting YASR.defaults, or by
passing your own options as second argument to the YASR constructor
classitems.name: YASR.defaults

classitems.description: key of default plugin to use
classitems.name: output

classitems.description: Draw the output selector widget
classitems.name: drawOutputSelector

classitems.description:
Draw download icon. This issues html5 download functionality to 'download' files created on the client-side.
 This allows the user to download results already queried for, such as a CSV when a table is shown, or the original response when the raw response output is selected
classitems.name: drawDownloadIcon

classitems.description:
Make certain settings and values of YASR persistent. Setting a key
to null, will disable persistancy: nothing is stored between browser
sessions Setting the values to a string (or a function which returns a
string), will store the query in localstorage using the specified string.
By default, the ID is dynamically generated by finding the nearest DOM element with an "id" set,
to avoid collissions when using multiple YASR items on one page
classitems.name: persistency

classitems.description: Persistency setting for the selected output
classitems.name: persistency.outputSelector

classitems.description: Persistency setting for query results.
classitems.name: persistency.results

classitems.description: Get the key to store results in
classitems.name: persistency.results.id

classitems.description:
The result set might too large to fit in local storage. 
It is impossible to detect how large the local storage is.
Therefore, we do not store all results in local storage, depending on a max number of characters in the SPARQL result serialization.
Set this function conservitavely. (especially when using multiple YASR instances on one page)
classitems.name: persistency.results.maxSize

classitems.description: Human-readable name of this plugin (used in selection widget)
classitems.name: pluginDoc.name

classitems.description: Check whether this plugin can handler the current results
classitems.name: canHandleResults
classitems.default: If resultset contains variables in the resultset, return true

classitems.description: If we need to dynamically check which plugin to use, we rank the possible plugins by priority, and select the highest one
classitems.name: getPriority

classitems.description: Defaults for table plugin
classitems.name: YASR.plugins.table.defaults

classitems.description: Draw the cell content, from a given binding
classitems.name: drawCellContent

classitems.description: Try to fetch the label representation for each URI, using the preflabel.org services. (fetching occurs when hovering over the cell)
classitems.name: fetchTitlesFromPreflabel

classitems.description: Set a number of handlers for the table
classitems.name: handlers

classitems.description: Mouse-enter-cell event
classitems.name: handlers.onCellMouseEnter

classitems.description: Mouse-leave-cell event
classitems.name: handlers.onCellMouseLeave

classitems.description: Cell clicked event
classitems.name: handlers.onCellClick

classitems.description:
This plugin uses the datatables jquery plugin (See datatables.net). For any datatables specific defaults, change this object. 
See the datatables reference for more information
classitems.name: datatable
